CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS_UPD_SP" ( p_table_name IN VARCHAR2, p_pk_id IN INTEGER, p_name IN VARCHAR2, p_description IN VARCHAR2, p_updated_by IN INTEGER, p_attribute1 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_attribute2 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_attribute3 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_attribute4 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_attribute5 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_language IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL ) IS v_count NUMBER; BEGIN IF p_name IS NOT NULL THEN SELECT COUNT (*) INTO v_count FROM cmn_captions_nls WHERE table_name = p_table_name AND pk_id = p_pk_id;
IF (v_count > 0) THEN -- If the language is passed then update the labels -- just for that particular language. If not then -- update the labels for all languages. IF p_language IS NULL THEN UPDATE cmn_captions_nls SET name = p_name, description = p_description, last_updated_date = SYSDATE, last_updated_by = p_updated_by, attribute1 = p_attribute1, attribute2 = p_attribute2, attribute3 = p_attribute3, attribute4 = p_attribute4, attribute5 = p_attribute5 WHERE table_name = p_table_name AND pk_id = p_pk_id; ELSE UPDATE cmn_captions_nls SET name = p_name, description = p_description, last_updated_date = SYSDATE, last_updated_by = p_updated_by, attribute1 = p_attribute1, attribute2 = p_attribute2, attribute3 = p_attribute3, attribute4 = p_attribute4, attribute5 = p_attribute5 WHERE table_name = p_table_name AND pk_id = p_pk_id AND language_code = p_language; END IF; ELSE cmn_captions_nls_ins_sp ( p_table_name, p_pk_id, p_name, p_description, p_updated_by, p_attribute1, p_attribute2, p_attribute3, p_attribute4, p_attribute5 ); END IF; END IF; END;
